==Carriage Parade==
{{Description|A Flower Carriage calmly awaiting the arrival of the Archon. It is itself a symbol of the splendid atmosphere of the [[Sabzeruz Festival]]. Sitting on the Carriage's swing, rocking back and forth, it's almost as if one can hear the laughter of the people passing by, and smell the fragrance of the flowers filling the sky.|Map Marker Description}}
